verses.verse: When Israel <S%H3478><s%> went forth out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, The house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> from a people <S%H5971><s%> of strange language <S%H3937><s%>;
Judah <S%H3063><s%> became his sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, Israel <S%H3478><s%> his dominion <S%H4475><s%>.
The sea <S%H3220><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it <S%H5127><s%>, and fled; The Jordan <S%H3383><s%> was driven <S%H5437><s%> back <S%H268><s%>.
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> skipped <S%H7540><s%> like rams <S%H352><s%>, The little hills <S%H1389><s%> like lambs <S%H1121><s%>.
What aileth thee <S%H3220><s%>, O thou sea, that thou fleest <S%H5127><s%>? Thou Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that thou turnest <S%H5437><s%> back <S%H268><s%>?
Ye mountains <S%H2022><s%>, that ye skip <S%H7540><s%> like rams <S%H352><s%>; Ye little hills <S%H1389><s%>, like lambs <S%H1121><s%>?
Tremble <S%H2342><s%>, thou earth <S%H776><s%>, at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H113><s%>, At the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the God <S%H433><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>,
Who turned <S%H2015><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%> into a pool <S%H98><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, The flint <S%H2496><s%> into a fountain <S%H4599><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%>.
